snippet: When Jonathan Darsky couldn’t find a suitable property in San Francisco to open a pizza restaurant, he decided to put an oven in a truck and take the pies to customers.
abstract: Pizza chef Jonathan Darsky has partnered with McLellan Equipment, a manufacturer of specialized truck bodies for the construction industry, to attach a 4,800-pound Neapolitan pizza oven to the bed of a Freightliner truck; Darsky decided to create a food truck capable of making wood-fired pizza after he was unable to find a suitable property for a restaurant.
lead_paragraph: When Jonathan Darsky couldn’t find a suitable property in San Francisco to open a pizza restaurant, he decided to put an oven in a truck and take the pies to customers.
